input_layer.description: 根據 input_ids 的長度，此處為 7

first_lstm_layer.description: 第一層 Bi-LSTM 處理 24 個時間點的數據

first_attention_layer.description: 使用固定外部時間權重作為 Q，不參與反向傳播

second_lstm_layer.description: 第二層 Bi-LSTM 處理第一層注意力後的數據

second_attention_layer.description: 自注意力層，Q/K/V 均來自第二層 Bi-LSTM

output_layer.name: advantage_stream
output_layer.description: 22 = 2 x 11，代表每個建議兩個 Q 值

output_layer.name: value_stream
output_layer.description: 11 個值，對應每個建議的 value

rules.condition: actual_rain == True and carry_umbrella == False
actual_rain == True and carry_umbrella == True
actual_rain == False and carry_umbrella == True
actual_rain == False and carry_umbrella == False
apparent_temp < 13 and wearing_warm_clothes == False
apparent_temp < 13 and wearing_warm_clothes == True
apparent_temp > 27 and wearing_warm_clothes == True
apparent_temp > 27 and wearing_warm_clothes == False
actual_temp < 13 and relative_humidity > 70 and damp_cold == True
actual_temp < 13 and relative_humidity > 70 and damp_cold == False
actual_temp < 13 and relative_humidity < 50 and dry_cold == True
actual_temp < 13 and relative_humidity < 50 and dry_cold == False
actual_temp > 27 and relative_humidity > 70 and damp_hot == True
actual_temp > 27 and relative_humidity > 70 and damp_hot == False
actual_temp > 27 and relative_humidity < 50 and dry_hot == True
actual_temp > 27 and relative_humidity < 50 and dry_hot == False
wind_speed > 7 and apparent_temp < 13 and wind_cold == True
wind_speed > 7 and apparent_temp < 13 and wind_cold == False
wind_speed > 7 and apparent_temp > 27 and wind_hot == True
wind_speed > 7 and apparent_temp > 27 and wind_hot == False
comfort_index >= 15 and outdoor_recommended == True
comfort_index >= 15 and outdoor_recommended == False
comfort_index < 15 and outdoor_recommended == False
comfort_index < 15 and outdoor_recommended == True
apparent_temp > 27 and increase_water_intake == True
apparent_temp > 27 and increase_water_intake == False
apparent_temp < 13 and dew_point < 0 and increase_water_intake == True
apparent_temp < 13 and dew_point < 0 and increase_water_intake == False
not(apparent_temp > 27 or (apparent_temp < 13 and dew_point < 0)) and increase_water_intake == False
not(apparent_temp > 27 or (apparent_temp < 13 and dew_point < 0)) and increase_water_intake == True
(actual_temp - dew_point) < 2 and actual_temp < 13 and ground_slippery_warning == True
(actual_temp - dew_point) < 2 and actual_temp < 13 and ground_slippery_warning == False
not((actual_temp - dew_point) < 2 and actual_temp < 13) and ground_slippery_warning == False
not((actual_temp - dew_point) < 2 and actual_temp < 13) and ground_slippery_warning == True
